item.title: ASAP - Automated Software-Assisted Provisioning
item.description: Collaborations Workshop 2018 - 2018-03-26 Collaborative Ideas - Group I - CI5-CW18 Reporter Sam Cox - sam.cox144@gmail.com Participants Sam Cox, Yo Yehudi, Carina Haupt, Robert Haines, Stephan Druskat, John Robinson ASAP - Automated Software-Assisted Provisioning Context / Research Domain New research projects will usually need some sort of infrastructure around it. Understanding and fulfilling these infrastructural needs is not something that Principal Investigators will have high up on their todo list.
